Uses of Package
net.adamcin.oakpal.core

  • Packages that use net.adamcin.oakpal.core 
    Package Description
    net.adamcin.oakpal.core  
  • Classes in net.adamcin.oakpal.core used by net.adamcin.oakpal.core 
    Class and Description
    AbortedScanException
    Represents an error that causes a package scan to abort without notifying the ErrorListener.
    CheckReport
    Type for collected Violations from a particlular PackageCheck.
    ErrorListener
    A single error handler is used during an OakPAL scan.
    ForcedRoot
    Encapsulation of details necessary to force creation of a particular root path.
    InitStage
    Encapsulation of JCR initialization parameters for multistage inits.
    InitStage.Builder
    Use the builder to construct the InitStage.
    PackageCheck
    Primary point of customization for the OakPAL framework.
    PackageCheckFactory
    A factory for creating PackageChecks that accepts a config map.
    PackageScanner
    Entry point for OakPAL Acceptance Library.
    PackageScanner.Builder
    Use the builder to construct the PackageScanner.
    ScanListener
    Defines listener notifications for beginning and end of scan common to ErrorListener and PackageCheck.
    SimpleReport
    Simple POJO implementing a CheckReport, used for deserialization.
    SimpleViolation
    Simple implementation of a Violation.
    Violation
    Report type for validations.
    Violation.Severity
    Levels of severity for violations detected during package scans.
    ViolationReporter
